#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    while(1){
        long long unsigned int a,b,count=0,f1=1,temp,f2=2;
        scanf("%llu %llu", &a,&b);
        if(a==0 && b==0){
            break;
        }
                   
        while(f2<=b){
            if(f2>=a){
              count++;
            }
            temp=f2;
            f2=f1+f2;
            f1=temp;
        
        
    }
    
    printf("%llu\n",count);
    }
}
